title: The Annotated ANSI C Standard: American National Standard for Programming Languages-C : Ansi/Iso 9899-1990
description: The ANSI C standard determines the primary specifications for programming in C for all types of environment. With agreement of the ANSI Committee, Herbert Schildt presents the standard with his own tips and insights. He offers explanations of even the most complicated topics, along with tips, insights and warnings, to help C programmers create functional and portable programs.
author: Herbert Schildt
